amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate $142 million appropriated for the Appalachian Regional Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of June 22 as amendment No. 8, that eliminates the $142 million appropriation for the Appalachian Regional Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 319 (Roll no. 491).
